name: Paths (strict)
description: The path around islands and peninsulas described by sailing directions on the Mao Kun map (excluding paths without geographic coordinates defined)

properties.name: Nanjing, Jiangsu to Taicang
properties.translation: [No guidance, since pilots can follow the banks of the river]
properties.translationHtml: [No guidance, since pilots can follow the banks of the river]

properties.name: Taicang, Jiangsu to Nanhuizui, Shanghai
properties.nameTc: 江蘇太倉到上海南匯嘴
properties.text: 《太倉港口》開船，用丹乙針，一更船平《吳淞江》。 用乙卯針，一更船到《南匯嘴》。
properties.translation: Starting from Taicang Harbor (太倉港口), sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Huangpu River (吳淞江). Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Nanhuizui (南匯嘴).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Taicangjiang [Liuhe], and steers exactly 105 degrees; after 1 watch the ship is level with Wusongjiang [Wusong bar]. Steer 105 degrees-90 degrees; after 1 watch, the ship reaches Nanhuicui.
properties.textHtml:
• 《太倉港口》開船，用丹乙針，一更船平《吳淞江》。
  • 用乙卯針，一更船到《南匯嘴》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Starting from Taicang Harbor (太倉港口), sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Huangpu River (吳淞江).
  • Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Nanhuizui (南匯嘴).

properties.name: Zhaobao, Shanghai to Jiushan Archipelago, Zhejiang
properties.text: 平《招寶》，用乙辰針，三更船出洪。 打水丈六七正路。 見《茶山》在東北。 邊過，用巽巳針，四更船見《大小七山》。 打水六七托。 用坤申及丁未針，三更船取《霍山》。 用丹午針，三更船取《(東)霍山》。 用丹午針，六(更船取)《西後門》。 用巽巳針，三更船取《大磨山》。 用乙辰針，一更船取《小磨山》轄《崎頭》《昇羅嶼》。 用丁未針，一更船出《雙嶼港》。 用丙午針，一更船取《孝順洋》。 一路，打水九托九平。 《九山》對《九山》西南邊，有一沆礁打浪。 有一沆礁打浪出水打船仔細。
properties.translation: When level with Zhaobao (招寶), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to exit the main current. The 5 fathom (6-7 托) contour is the correct course to the mouth of the river. You will sight Sheshan Island (茶山) on the northeast side. After passing it, sail on a course of 142.5º (巽巳, SSE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until you see Gutzlaff Island (大小七山). Keep your soundings in 5 fathoms (6-7 托). Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更)  reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Donghuo Island (霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 14.4 hours (6 更) to reach Xihoumen (西後門). Sail on a course of 142.5° (巽巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Xiaomoshan (小磨山), round the Qitou Ocean (崎頭), and reach Shengluo Yuanshan (昇羅嶼). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to exit Shuangyu Port (雙嶼港). Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午, SSE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) through Xiaoshan Ocean (孝順洋). Follow the 7 fathom (9-9.5 托) contour all the way. There is a reef making waves extending from Jiushan (九山) toward the southwest. Sail carefully as you exit.
properties.millsTranslation: When level with Zhaobao (near Gaoqiao), steer 105-120 degrees. After 3 watches the ship goes out into the main. Take a sounding 6 or 7 zhang; that is the correct course. You sight Chashan on the northeast side; After passing it steer 135-150 degrees; after 4 watches the ship sights Da (Daqishan, 30o 48' N) and Xiao qishan (Hen and Chicks). Take a sounding, 6 or 7 fathoms. Steer 225-240 degrees, then 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer exactly 180 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Heshan (Dongheshan, 30o 15' N). Steering exactly 180 degrees, the ship enters Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer 135-150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan, 29o 56' N). Steer 105-120 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaomoshan (Xiaomaoshan), rounds Qitou 29o 53' N), and makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship goes out through Shangxu jiang (Duffield pass). Steer 165-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaoshunyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel). Take soundings all along the route. The depth is 9 fathoms when you are level with Jiushan (Kueshan) islands. Opposite to Jiushan on the southwest side there is one sunken rock which shows above the water when the waves break on it (Heijiao, Holderness rocks). Navigate the ship carefully in all directions.
properties.textHtml:
• 平《招寶》，用乙辰針，三更船出洪。
  • 打水丈六七正路。
  • 見《茶山》在東北。
  • 邊過，用巽巳針，四更船見《大小七山》。
  • 打水六七托。
  • 用坤申及丁未針，三更船取《霍山》。
  • 用丹午針，三更船取《(東)霍山》。
  • 用丹午針，六(更船取)《西後門》。
  • 用巽巳針，三更船取《大磨山》。
  • 用乙辰針，一更船取《小磨山》轄《崎頭》《昇羅嶼》。
  • 用丁未針，一更船出《雙嶼港》。
  • 用丙午針，一更船取《孝順洋》。
  • 一路，打水九托九平。
  • 《九山》對《九山》西南邊，有一沆礁打浪。
  • 有一沆礁打浪出水打船仔細。
properties.translationHtml:
• When level with Zhaobao (招寶), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to exit the main current.
  • The 5 fathom (6-7 托) contour is the correct course to the mouth of the river.
  • You will sight Sheshan Island (茶山) on the northeast side.
  • After passing it, sail on a course of 142.5º (巽巳, SSE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until you see Gutzlaff Island (大小七山).
  • Keep your soundings in 5 fathoms (6-7 托).
  • Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更) reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山).
  • Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Donghuo Island (霍山).
  • Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 14.4 hours (6 更) to reach Xihoumen (西後門).
  • Sail on a course of 142.5° (巽巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山).
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Xiaomoshan (小磨山), round the Qitou Ocean (崎頭), and reach Shengluo Yuanshan (昇羅嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to exit Shuangyu Port (雙嶼港).
  • Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午, SSE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) through Xiaoshan Ocean (孝順洋).
  • Follow the 7 fathom (9-9.5 托) contour all the way.
  • There is a reef making waves extending from Jiushan (九山) toward the southwest.
  • Sail carefully as you exit.

properties.name: Jiushan Archipelago, Zhejiang to Dongtou Island
properties.text: 用辛午針，二更船平《檀頭山》。 東邊有《江片礁》，西邊見《大佛頭山》。 平《東西崎山》，用丁午針，五更船平《羊琪》及《大陳》《三母》。 黄礁前見《直谷山》。 用丁未針，二更船平《石塘山》。 用丁未針，三更船平《狹山》外渦。 用坤未針，二更船取《黄(礁)山》。 打水十七八托平《中界山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午 mislabeled as 辛午?, SSE) for 4.8 hours (2 更), until even with Tantoushan Island (檀頭山). Jiangpian Reef (江片礁) is on the east side. Look for Hua'ao Island (大佛頭山) on the west side. Even with the Dongji Archipelago (東西崎山), sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Yangqi Island (羊琪), Xiadachen Island (大陳), and Shangdachen Island (三母). In front of Yellow Reef, look for Jigu Island (直谷山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to be even with Niushan Island (石塘山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be to pass outside Pishan Island (狹山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Huangjiaodao (黄山). Follow the 13 fathom (17-18 托) contour when passing Dongtou Island (中界山).
properties.millsTranslation: After 2 watches the ship is level with Tantou shan (29º 10' N). On the east side is Jiangbianjiao; on the west side you see Dafoshan (Dafutou). When you are level with Dongxi qi shan (Dong Jishan and Gaodao), steer 195-180 degrees. After 5 watches the ship is level with Yangqi (Pingfeng shan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and San mu (Shang Da chen shan, 28º 30' N), and Huangjiao (Shangxu). In front you see Zhigushan; steer 195-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship is level with Shitang shan (Niushan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Xiashan (Pishan, 28º 05' N) and passes it on the outside. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Huangshan (Banmianshan?). Take a sounding, 17-18 fathoms. The ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?)
properties.textHtml:
• 用辛午針，二更船平《檀頭山》。
  • 東邊有《江片礁》，西邊見《大佛頭山》。
  • 平《東西崎山》，用丁午針，五更船平《羊琪》及《大陳》《三母》。
  • 黄礁前見《直谷山》。
  • 用丁未針，二更船平《石塘山》。
  • 用丁未針，三更船平《狹山》外渦。
  • 用坤未針，二更船取《黄(礁)山》。
  • 打水十七八托平《中界山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 172.5º (丙午 mislabeled as 辛午?, SSE) for 4.8 hours (2 更), until even with Tantoushan Island (檀頭山).
  • Jiangpian Reef (江片礁) is on the east side. Look for Hua'ao Island (大佛頭山) on the west side.
  • Even with the Dongji Archipelago (東西崎山), sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Yangqi Island (羊琪), Xiadachen Island (大陳), and Shangdachen Island (三母).
  • In front of Yellow Reef, look for Jigu Island (直谷山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to be even with Niushan Island (石塘山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be to pass outside Pishan Island (狹山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Huangjiaodao (黄山).
  • Follow the 13 fathom (17-18 托) contour when passing Dongtou Island (中界山).

properties.name: Dongtou Island, Zhejiang to Fuying Island, Fujian
properties.text: 用坤未針一更船取《東洛山》。 用坤未針一更船取《南己山》外渦船。 用丹坤及坤未針三更船取《臺山》。 打水二十托。 用坤未針三更船取《東乗西乗山》。 用坤未針二更船取《芙蓉山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beiji Island (東洛山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Nanji Island (南己山). Sail on a course of 225º (坤, SW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Taishan Island. (臺山) Follow the 14 fathom (20 托) contour through the channel. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Nanshuang (東乗) and Beishuang (西乗) Islands. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Fuying Island (芙蓉山).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan).  Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Nanjishan (27º 28' N), and the ship passes outside it. Steer exactly 225 degrees, then 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N), take a sounding, 20 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees, after 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao).  Steer 225-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用坤未針一更船取《東洛山》。
  • 用坤未針一更船取《南己山》外渦船。
  • 用丹坤及坤未針三更船取《臺山》。
  • 打水二十托。
  • 用坤未針三更船取《東乗西乗山》。
  • 用坤未針二更船取《芙蓉山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beiji Island (東洛山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Nanji Island (南己山).
  • Sail on a course of 225º (坤, SW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Taishan Island. (臺山)
  • Follow the 14 fathom (20 托) contour through the channel.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Nanshuang (東乗) and Beishuang (西乗) Islands.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Fuying Island (芙蓉山).

properties.name: Xiyang Island, Fujian to Beijiao
properties.text: 外渦平《洪山》，用坤申針及丹坤針，二更船取《北交》。
properties.translation: Passing outside Xiyang Island (洪山), follow the course 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 225º (坤, SW) and sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Beijiao (北交).
properties.millsTranslation: When level with Hongshan (Zhizhudao), steer 225-240 degrees and then exactly 225 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Beijiao (Beiling sijiao, 26º 22' N)
properties.textHtml: • 外渦平《洪山》，用坤申針及丹坤針，二更船取《北交》。
properties.translationHtml: • Passing outside Xiyang Island (洪山), follow the course 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 225º (坤, SW) and sail 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Beijiao (北交).

properties.name: Beiji Island, Zhejiang to Huangwan Island, Fujian
properties.text: 《東洛山門》內過，用庚申及坤申針，一更船平《鳳凰山》過《南己山》。 打水十三托。 用坤未針，三更船取《臺山》內過。 用坤未針，三更船取《東乗》內過。 船取坤未針，二更船取《芙蓉山》內過。 用丁未針，一更船過《小西洋山》。
properties.translation: Passing inside of Beiji Island (東洛山), sail on a course of 247.5º (庚申, WSW) and 232.5º (坤申, WSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Phoenix Island (鳳凰山) and Nanji Island (南己山). Follow the 22 fathom (30 托) contour through the channel. Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass insideTaishan Island (臺山). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass inside Nanshuang Island (東乗). Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass inside Fuying Island (芙蓉山). Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Huangwan Island (小西洋山).
properties.millsTranslation: Passing within Dongleshan men (the passage westward of Beijishan), steer 255-240 degrees, and then 225-240 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Fenghuangshan (27º 41' N). On passing Nanjishan (27º 28' N) take a sounding 13 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N) and passes inside it. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao), and passes inside it. The ship steers 225-210 degrees, and after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan) and passes inside it. Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship passes Xiao xi yang shan (Isimasidao).
properties.textHtml:
• 《東洛山門》內過，用庚申及坤申針，一更船平《鳳凰山》過《南己山》。
  • 打水十三托。
  • 用坤未針，三更船取《臺山》內過。
  • 用坤未針，三更船取《東乗》內過。
  • 船取坤未針，二更船取《芙蓉山》內過。
  • 用丁未針，一更船過《小西洋山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Passing inside of Beiji Island (東洛山), sail on a course of 247.5º (庚申, WSW) and 232.5º (坤申, WSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Phoenix Island (鳳凰山) and Nanji Island (南己山).
  • Follow the 22 fathom (30 托) contour through the channel.
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass insideTaishan Island (臺山).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass inside Nanshuang Island (東乗).
  • Sail on a course of 217.5º (坤未, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass inside Fuying Island (芙蓉山).
  • Sail on a course of 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass Huangwan Island (小西洋山).

properties.name: Huangwan Island, Fujian to Dongchong Peninsula
properties.text: 用丁午針，一更船取《北交頭門》。 內過沿山，取《定海》所前過。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beijiao Channel (北交頭門). Go in, along the island to pass in front of Dinghai (定海).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Beijiaotou men (the passage between Beilingisjiao and Beixu (is), 26º 22' N). Pass within it. Follow the mountains, make Dinghaisuo (Dinghaitown) and pass in front of it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用丁午針，一更船取《北交頭門》。
  • 內過沿山，取《定海》所前過。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Beijiao Channel (北交頭門).
  • Go in, along the island to pass in front of Dinghai (定海).

properties.name: Around Wuhu Reef, Fujian
properties.text: 用丁午針，二更船取《五虎山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Wuhu Reef (五虎山).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan, 26º 05' N).
properties.textHtml: • 用丁午針，二更船取《五虎山》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 187.5º (丁午, SSW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Wuhu Reef (五虎山).

properties.name: Wuhu Reef, Fujian to Niushan
properties.text: 用乙辰針，平《官塘》二礁外渦。 用丙巳針，取《東沙》。 《東沙》用丹巳針，三更船平《牛山》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) to pass ouside the Jixingjiao (官塘) second reef. Sail on a course of 157.5º (丙巳, SSE) to reach Juguang Township (東沙). From Juguang Township (東沙), sail on a course of 150º (巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Niushan Island (牛山).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 105-120 degrees; come level with the two rocks called Guantang (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N), and pass outside them. Steer 165-150, make Dongsha (Xichuandao). From Dongsha steer exactly 150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship is level with Niushan (25º 25' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 用乙辰針，平《官塘》二礁外渦。
  • 用丙巳針，取《東沙》。
  • 《東沙》用丹巳針，三更船平《牛山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) to pass ouside the Jixingjiao (官塘) second reef.
  • Sail on a course of 157.5º (丙巳, SSE) to reach Juguang Township (東沙).
  • From Juguang Township (東沙), sail on a course of 150º (巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Niushan Island (牛山).

properties.name: Aceh, Indonesia to Kepulauan Arwah
properties.text: 《蘇門答剌》開船， 用丑艮及乙艮針，五更船平《急水湾》。 《巴碌頭》有淺。 用艮巽針，五更船取《甘杯港》。 用艮巽針，十五更船平《亞路》。 用乙艮針，五更船取《單嶼》。 再用艮巽針，四更船取《雙嶼》。 用丹巽及辰巽針，十五更船取《雞骨嶼》。
properties.translation: Sailing from the opening of Samudera Pasai (蘇門答剌, Lhokseumawe), Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Meunasah Asan (急水湾). Peureulak Sultanate (巴碌頭, East Aceh) has shallows. Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Kampei Port (甘杯港, Kuala Langsa). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to even with Aru Kingdom (亞路, Medan). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Berhala (單嶼). Then, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach The Brothers (雙嶼). Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) and 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kepulauan Arwah (雞骨嶼).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97° 13' E]; steer 30°-45° and [then] 105°-120°; after 5 watches the ship is level with Jishuiwan [Udjung Djambuaje, 5° 15' N] [and then] Balu tou [Udjung Peureula, 4° 54' N]; there are shoals.  Steer 120°-135°; after 5 watches the ship makes Ganbeijiang [Kumpai roadstead, 4° 11' N]. Steer 120°-135°; after 15 watches the ship is level with Yalu [Deli River, 3° 47' N]. Steer 105°-120°; [f. 16v] after 5 watches the ship makes Danxu [Berhala island, 3° 46' N]. [f. 17] Again steer 120°-135°; after 4 watches the ship makes Shuangxu [the Brothers, ca 3° 23' N]. Steer exactly 135° and [then] 120° [f. 16v]-135°; after 15 watches the ship makes Jiguxu [Aruah islands, 2° 53' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 《蘇門答剌》開船，
  • 用丑艮及乙艮針，五更船平《急水湾》。
  • 《巴碌頭》有淺。
  • 用艮巽針，五更船取《甘杯港》。
  • 用艮巽針，十五更船平《亞路》。
  • 用乙艮針，五更船取《單嶼》。
  • 再用艮巽針，四更船取《雙嶼》。
  • 用丹巽及辰巽針，十五更船取《雞骨嶼》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sailing from the opening of Samudera Pasai (蘇門答剌, Lhokseumawe),
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Meunasah Asan (急水湾).
  • Peureulak Sultanate (巴碌頭, East Aceh) has shallows.
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Kampei Port (甘杯港, Kuala Langsa).
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to even with Aru Kingdom (亞路, Medan).
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Berhala (單嶼).
  • Then, sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach The Brothers (雙嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) and 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kepulauan Arwah (雞骨嶼).

properties.name: Kepulauan Arwah, Indonesia to Malacca, Malaysia
properties.text: 取《雞骨嶼》，用丹辰及辰乙針，三更船平《綿花淺》。 用乙辰及丹辰針，三更船平《綿花(嶼)》。 用辰巽針，十更船平《滿剌加》。
properties.translation: Upon reaching Kepulauan Arwah, sail on a course of 120º (辰, ESE) and 112.5º (辰乙, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Amazon Maru Shoal (綿花淺). Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙艮, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Bukit Jugra (綿花). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Malacca (滿剌加).
properties.millsTranslation: After making Jiguxu, steer exactly 120° and [then] 120°-105°; after 3 watches the ship is level with Mianhua qian [Amazon Maru shoal, 2° 51' N]. Steer 105°-120° and [then] exactly 120°; [f. 16] after 3 watches [f. 16v] the ship is level with Mianhua qian [read Mianhua xu, 'Cotton island', Bukit Jugra, 2° 51' N]. Steer 120°-135°; [f. 16] after 10 watches the ship is level with Manlajia [Malacca, 2° 12' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 取《雞骨嶼》，用丹辰及辰乙針，三更船平《綿花淺》。
  • 用乙辰及丹辰針，三更船平《綿花(嶼)》。
  • 用辰巽針，十更船平《滿剌加》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Upon reaching Kepulauan Arwah, sail on a course of 120º (辰, ESE) and 112.5º (辰乙, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Amazon Maru Shoal (綿花淺).
  • Sail on a course of 112.5º (乙艮, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to even with Bukit Jugra (綿花).
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to even with Malacca (滿剌加).

properties.name: Malacca, Malaysia to Great Karimun, Indonesia
properties.text: 《滿剌加》開船，用辰巽針，五更船平《射箭山》。 用辰巽針，三更船平《毘宋嶼》。 用丹巽針，取《吉利》。
properties.translation: From the entrance to Malacca (滿剌加), sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Mount Banang (射箭山). Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Pisang Island (毘宋嶼). Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) to reach Great Karimun (吉利).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Manlajia; steer 120°-135°; after 5 watches the ship is level with Shejianshan [Bukit Banang, 1° 48' N]. Steer 120°-135°; after 3 watches the ship is level with Pisongxu [Pulau Pisang, 1° 28' N]. Steer exactly 135°, and make Jili [read Jilimen, Little Karimun island, 1° 08' N].
properties.textHtml:
• 《滿剌加》開船，用辰巽針，五更船平《射箭山》。
  • 用辰巽針，三更船平《毘宋嶼》。
  • 用丹巽針，取《吉利》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From the entrance to Malacca (滿剌加), sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to be even with Mount Banang (射箭山).
  • Sail on a course of 127.5º (辰巽, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to be even with Pisang Island (毘宋嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 135º (巽, SE) to reach Great Karimun (吉利).

properties.name: Great Karimun, Indonesia to Singapore Strait
properties.text: 《吉利門》五更船，用乙辰及丹辰針，取《長腰嶼》。 出《龍牙門》。
properties.translation: From Karimun Channel (吉利門), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Satumu (長腰嶼). Exit at Singapore Strait (龍牙門).
properties.millsTranslation: From Jilimen [Little Karimun island, 103° 24' E], for 5 watches the ship steers 105°-120° and [then] exactly 120°, makes Changyao xu [Pulau Satumu, Raffles Lighthouse], and goes out through Longya strait.
properties.textHtml:
• 《吉利門》五更船，用乙辰及丹辰針，取《長腰嶼》。
  • 出《龍牙門》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Karimun Channel (吉利門), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pulau Satumu (長腰嶼).
  • Exit at Singapore Strait (龍牙門).

properties.name: Singapore Strait to Pedra Branca, Singapore
properties.text: 《龍牙門》，用甲卯針，五更船取《白礁》。
properties.translation: From Singapore Strait (龍牙門), sail on a course of 82.5º (甲卯, ENE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pedra Branca (白礁).
properties.millsTranslation: From Longya strait, steering 75°-90° [f. 15] for 5 watches, the ship makes Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 104° 24' E].
properties.textHtml: • 《龍牙門》，用甲卯針，五更船取《白礁》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Singapore Strait (龍牙門), sail on a course of 82.5º (甲卯, ENE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Pedra Branca (白礁).

properties.name: Pedra Branca, Singapore to Pulau Aur, Malaysia
properties.text: 《白礁》過用癸丑及丹癸針五更船平《東竹山》外過。
properties.translation: When passing Pedra Branca (白礁), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNE) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to pass outside Pulau Aur (東竹山).
properties.millsTranslation: After passing Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 1º 19' N] steer 15º-30º and [then] exactly 15º; after 5 watches the ship is level with Dongzhu shan [Pulau Aur, 2º 26' N], and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml: • 《白礁》過用癸丑及丹癸針五更船平《東竹山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing Pedra Branca (白礁), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNE) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to pass outside Pulau Aur (東竹山).

properties.name: Pulau Aur, Malaysia to Côn Lôn, Vietnam
properties.text: 《東竹山》過，用子丑及丹癸針，船取《崑崙山》外過。
properties.translation: When passing Pulau Aur (東竹山) sail on a course of 352.5º (子壬 mistakenly written as 子丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) to pass outside Côn Lôn (崑崙山).
properties.millsTranslation: After passing Dongzhu shan, steer 0°-30° and [then] exactly 15°; [f 14v] the ship makes Kunlun shan [Grand Condore, 8° 41' N], and passes outside it. [f. 13]
properties.textHtml: • 《東竹山》過，用子丑及丹癸針，船取《崑崙山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing Pulau Aur (東竹山) sail on a course of 352.5º (子壬 mistakenly written as 子丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) to pass outside Côn Lôn (崑崙山).

properties.name: Côn Lôn, Vietnam to Mũi Dinh
properties.text: 《崑崙山》外渦，用癸丑針，十五更船取《赤坎山》。 用丑艮及丹艮。
properties.translation: When passing outside Côn Lôn (崑崙山), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Point Kê Gà (赤坎山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 45º (艮, NE).
properties.millsTranslation: After passing on the outside of Kunlun shan steer 15°-30°; after 15 watches the ship makes Chikan shan [Point Ke Ga, 10° 41' N, 107° 59' E]. Steer 30°-45° and [then] exactly 45°
properties.textHtml:
• 《崑崙山》外渦，用癸丑針，十五更船取《赤坎山》。
  • 用丑艮及丹艮。
properties.translationHtml:
• When passing outside Côn Lôn (崑崙山), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Point Kê Gà (赤坎山).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 45º (艮, NE).

properties.name: Đá Bia Mountain, Vietnam to Nhơn Hải Peninsula
properties.text: 《靈山》，用壬子及丹壬針，五更船平《洋嶼》取《筊杯山(嶼)》。
properties.translation: From Đá Bia Mountain (靈山), sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) and 345º (壬, NNW) for 12 hours (5 更) until even with Cù lao Xanh (洋嶼) and reach the Nhơn Hải Peninsula (筊杯山).
properties.millsTranslation: [f. 12v] From Lingshan steer 345°-360° and [then] exactly 345°; after 5 watches the ship [f 12] is level with Yangxu [Poulo Gambir, 13° 37' N], and [then] makes Jiaobeishan [Nui Ong Co and Nui Ong Can, 13° 54' N].
properties.textHtml: • 《靈山》，用壬子及丹壬針，五更船平《洋嶼》取《筊杯山(嶼)》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Đá Bia Mountain (靈山), sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) and 345º (壬, NNW) for 12 hours (5 更) until even with Cù lao Xanh (洋嶼) and reach the Nhơn Hải Peninsula (筊杯山).

properties.name: Nhơn Hải Peninsula, Vietnam to Cù-Lao Ré Island
properties.text: 《筊杯山(嶼)》，用壬子針，七更船取《外羅山》外過。
properties.translation: From the Nhơn Hải Peninsula (筊杯山), sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) for 21.6 hours (9 更) to pass outside Cù-Lao Ré Island (外羅山).
properties.millsTranslation: From Jiaobeishan steer 345°-360°; after 7 watches the ship makes Wailuoshan [Culao Re, 15° 23' N], and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml: • 《筊杯山(嶼)》，用壬子針，七更船取《外羅山》外過。
properties.translationHtml: • From the Nhơn Hải Peninsula (筊杯山), sail on a course of 352.5º (壬子, NNW) for 21.6 hours (9 更) to pass outside Cù-Lao Ré Island (外羅山).

properties.name: Cù-Lao Ré Island, Vietnam to Dazhou Island, Hainan
properties.text: 《外羅山》內過，(用)癸丑及单癸針，二十一更船平《獨豬山》。
properties.translation: When passing inside Cù-Lao Ré Island (外羅山), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 50.4 hours (21 更) until even with Dazhou Island (獨豬山).
properties.millsTranslation: [f 11v] Passing on the inside of Wailuoshan, [steer] 15°-30° and [then] exactly 15°; after 21 watches the ship is level with Duzhushan [Dazhoudao, 18° 40' N, 110° 28' E].
properties.textHtml: • 《外羅山》內過，(用)癸丑及单癸針，二十一更船平《獨豬山》。
properties.translationHtml: • When passing inside Cù-Lao Ré Island (外羅山), sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE) for 50.4 hours (21 更) until even with Dazhou Island (獨豬山).

properties.name: Dazhou Island, Hainan to Pedro Blanco, Guangdong
properties.text: 《獨豬山》，(用)丹艮針，五更船。 用艮寅針，十更船平《大星尖》外過。
properties.translation: From Dazhou Island (獨豬山), sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 12 hours (5 更). Sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 24 hours (10 更) to be level with Pedro Blanco (大星尖), on the outside.
properties.millsTranslation: From Duzhushan (Dazhoudao, 18º 40' N, 110º 28' E), steer exactly 45 degrees for 5 watches; the ship steers 45-60 degrees for 10 watches, [other books indicate that the total of 15 watches shold be changed to 25.] comes level with Daxingjian (Pedro Blanco, 22º 19' N), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 《獨豬山》，(用)丹艮針，五更船。
  • 用艮寅針，十更船平《大星尖》外過。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Dazhou Island (獨豬山), sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 12 hours (5 更).
  • Sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 24 hours (10 更) to be level with Pedro Blanco (大星尖), on the outside.

properties.name: Pedro Blanco, Guangdong to Taiwu Mountian, Fujian
properties.text: 《大星尖》，用丹寅針，十五更船平《南粵山》。 《外平山》外過，用寅針，三更船平《大甘》《小甘》外過。 用丹艮針，四更船平《大武山》。
properties.translation: From Pedro Blanco (大星尖), sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 36 hours (15 更) until even with Nan'ao Island (南粵山). Passing outside the Nanpang Islands (外平山), sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 7.6 hours (3 更) to pass outside The Brothers (大甘小甘). Sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Taiwu Mountian (大武山).
properties.millsTranslation: From Daxingjian steer exactly 60 degrees. After 15 watches the ship is level with Nan'ao shan (23º 25' N) and Waipengshan (Nanpingdao) and passes outside them.  Steer 45 to 60 degrees, after 3 watches the ship is level with Dagan and Xiaogan (Brothers islands, 23º 33' N) and passes outside them.  Steer exactly 45 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Dawushan (24º 20' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 《大星尖》，用丹寅針，十五更船平《南粵山》。
  • 《外平山》外過，用寅針，三更船平《大甘》《小甘》外過。
  • 用丹艮針，四更船平《大武山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Pedro Blanco (大星尖), sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 36 hours (15 更) until even with Nan'ao Island (南粵山).
  • Passing outside the Nanpang Islands (外平山), sail on a course of 60º (寅, ENE) for 7.6 hours (3 更) to pass outside The Brothers (大甘小甘).
  • Sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Taiwu Mountian (大武山).

properties.name: Taiwu Mountian, Fujian to Wuqiu, Taiwan
properties.text: 《大武山》，用丹艮針，七更船平《烏邱山》。
properties.translation: From Taiwu Mountian (大武山), sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 16.8 hours (7 更) until even with Wuqiu Township (烏邱山).
properties.millsTranslation: From Dawushan steer exactly 45 degrees; after 7 watches the ship is level with Wuqiushan (Wuqiuxu, 24º 59' N).
properties.textHtml: • 《大武山》，用丹艮針，七更船平《烏邱山》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Taiwu Mountian (大武山), sail on a course of 45º (艮, NE) for 16.8 hours (7 更) until even with Wuqiu Township (烏邱山).

properties.name: Wuqiu, Taiwan to Juguang
properties.text: 《烏邱山》，用艮寅針，四更船平《牛山》。 用丑艮針，五更船取《東沙山》。
properties.translation: From Wuqiu Township (烏邱山), sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Niushan Island (牛山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Juguang Township (東沙山).
properties.millsTranslation: From Wuqiushan steer 45-60 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Niushan, 25º 25' N. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 5 watches, the ship makes Dongshashan (Xichuandao, 25º 58' N).
properties.textHtml:
• 《烏邱山》，用艮寅針，四更船平《牛山》。
  • 用丑艮針，五更船取《東沙山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Wuqiu Township (烏邱山), sail on a course of 52.5º (艮寅, ENE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until even with Niushan Island (牛山).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 12 hours (5 更) to reach Juguang Township (東沙山).

properties.name: Juguang, Taiwan to Dongyin Island
properties.text: 《東沙山》，用丑艮針，一更船平《官塘山》。 用丑艮針，一更船《五虎山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《龜嶼》。 用丑艮針，一更船取《東湧山》外過。
properties.translation: From Juguang Township (東沙山),sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Jixingjiao (官塘山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to Wuhu Reef (五虎山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to Dongsha Island (龜嶼). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Dongyin Island (東湧山).
properties.millsTranslation: From Dongshashan steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Guantangshan (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N). [wrong here; and map is wrong in indicating that Guantangshan is on the east of the course from Dongsha to Guixu.]  Steer 30-45 degrees, after 1 watch the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan).  Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Guixu (Dongsha, 26º 09' N0. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongyongshan (Dongyinshan, 26º 22' N), and passes outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 《東沙山》，用丑艮針，一更船平《官塘山》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船《五虎山》。
  • 用丑艮針，三更船取《龜嶼》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船取《東湧山》外過。
properties.translationHtml:
• From Juguang Township (東沙山),sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Jixingjiao (官塘山).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to Wuhu Reef (五虎山).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to Dongsha Island (龜嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to pass outside Dongyin Island (東湧山).

properties.name: Dongyin Island, Taiwan to Nanji Island, Zhejiang
properties.text: 《東湧山》，用丑艮針，二更船平《東乗山》《西乗山》。 用丑艮針，二更船平《臺山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《南己》。
properties.translation: From Dongyin Island (東湧山), sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Nanshuang (東乗山) and Beishuang (西乗山) Islands. Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Taishan Island (臺山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Nanji Island (南己).
properties.millsTranslation: From Dongyongshan steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Dongqishan (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao). Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Taishan (26º 59' N Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanji (27º 28' N)
properties.textHtml:

properties.translationHtml:
• From Dongyin Island (東湧山), sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Nanshuang (東乗山) and Beishuang (西乗山) Islands.
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) until even with Taishan Island (臺山).
  • Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Nanji Island (南己).

properties.name: Nanji Island, Zhejiang to Tantoushan Island
properties.text: 用丑艮針，二更船取《東洛山》。 用丑艮針，一更船平《中界山》及《黄山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《狹山》外過。 用癸丑針，三更船平《直谷山》。 用癸丑針，二更船取《羊琪山》及《大陳》《三母山》。 用子癸針，二更船取《東西岳山》。 用子癸針，三更船取《檀頭山》外過。 對開有礁，内外過船。 東北邊有沉礁打辰，子細內外過船。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Beiji Island (東洛山). Sail on a course of 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Dongtou Island (中界山) and Banpingdao (黄山). Sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Pishan Island (狹山). Sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) until even with Jigu Island (直谷山). Sail on a course of 22.5º (癸丑, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach Yangqi (羊琪山), Xiadachen (大陳), and Shangdachen (三母山) Islands. Sail on a course of 7.5º (子癸, NNE) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to reach the Dongji Archipelago (東西岳山). Sail on a course of 7.5º (子癸, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to pass outside Tantoushan Island (檀頭山). There is a reef far outside; sail inside or outside. The northeast side has a sunken reef making waves, sail inside or outside carefully.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan) Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?) and Huangshan (Banmianshan?) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Xiashan (Pishan), 28º 05' N, and passes outside it. Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Zhigushan (28º 23' N) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Yangqishan (Pingfengshan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and Sanmushan (Shang Da chen shan) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dong Xi Qishan (Dongjishan and Gaodao) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dantoushan (29º 10' N), and passes outside it; Appearing opposite is a rock; the ship can pass inside or outside it; on the northeast side there is a sunken rock on which the waves break, [navigate] carefully; the ship can pass inside or outside it.
properties.textHtml:
• 用丑艮針，二更船取《東洛山》。
  • 用丑艮針，一更船平《中界山》及《黄山》。

  • 東北邊有沉礁打辰，子細內外過船。

properties.name: Tantoushan Island, Zhejiang to Taicang Port, Jiangsu
properties.text: 用子癸針，三更船取《九山》及《乱礁洋》。 用壬子針，二更船過順《孝順洋》取《雙嶼港》。 用癸丑針，一更船取《昇羅嶼》《廟州門》內過轄《崎頭》。 用辛戌針，一更船取《大磨山》。 用乾亥針，二更船出《西後門》。 用丹子針，取《(東)霍山》。 用丹子及子癸針，三更船取《灘山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《七山》。 用乾亥針，四更船見《茶山》。 用酉辛針，三更船取《南滙嘴》收汧平《宝山》。 用辛酉針，三更船取《吳淞江》到《太倉港口》軗系船。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 7.5º (子癸, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach the Jiushan Archipelago (九山) and Chaos Reef (乱礁洋). Sail on a course of 352.5° (壬子, NNW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to pass the Xiaoshan Ocean (孝順洋) and Shuangyu Port (雙嶼港). Sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Shengluo Island (昇羅嶼), pass through Yangxiaomao Channel (廟州門), round Qitou Peninsula (崎頭). Sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戌, WNW) for 2.4 hours (2 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山). Sail on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) for 4.8 hours (2 更) to exit Xihoumen (西後門). Sail due north to reach Donghuo Island (霍山). Sail on a course of 7.5° (子癸, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Tanhu Island (灘山). Sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Gutzlaff Island (七山). Sail on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) for 9.6 hours (4 更) to reach Sheshan Island (茶山). Sail on a course of 277.5° (酉辛, WNW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to see Nanhuizui (南滙嘴) and reach a point level with Baoshan (宝山). Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to see the Huangpu River (吳淞江) to Taicang Port (太倉港口) and moor the ship.
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Jiushan (29º 26' N) and Luanjiaoyang (southern portion of Niubishan Channel) Steer 345-360 degrees. After 2 watches the ship passes Xiaoshanyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel), and makes Shuangxujiang (Duffield pass). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan) and Miaozhoumen (the channel between Roundabout island and the coast), passes within the latter and goes round Qitou (29º 53' N). Steer 285-300 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan). Steer 315-330 degrees. After 2 watches the ship goes out through Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer exactly 0 degrees and make Heshan (Dongheshan, 30º 15' N). Steer exactly 0 degrees, and then 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Qishan (Daqishan, 30º 48' N) Steer 315-330 degrees. After 4 watches the ship sights Chashan. Steer 285-270 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanhuizui, leaves the main, and comes level with Baoshan (Zhaobaoshan, near Gaoqiao).
properties.textHtml:

  • 用壬子針，二更船過順《孝順洋》取《雙嶼港》。

properties.name: Sumadera Pasai, Indonesia to Pulau Rondo
properties.text: 《蘇門答剌》開船，用乾戍針，十二更，船平《龍涎嶼》。
properties.translation: From Sumadera Pasai (蘇門答剌), sail on a course of 307.5° (乾戍, WNW) for 28.8 hours (12 更) to come even with Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97° 13' E]; steer 315°-300°; after 12 watches the ship is level with [f. 18] Longxianxu [Poulo Rondo, 95° 07' E]
properties.textHtml: • 《蘇門答剌》開船，用乾戍針，十二更，船平《龍涎嶼》。
properties.translationHtml: • From Sumadera Pasai (蘇門答剌), sail on a course of 307.5° (乾戍, WNW) for 28.8 hours (12 更) to come even with Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼).

properties.name: Pulau Rondo, Indonesia to Sri Lanka via Nicobar
properties.text: 《龍涎嶼》開船時月，用辛戍針，十更船見《翠藍嶼》。 用辛針，三十更船。 用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translation: When starting from Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼), sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 24 hours (10 更) to see Great Nicobar Island (翠藍嶼). Sail on a course of 285° (辛, WNW) for 3 days (30 更). Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to see Sri Lanka (錫蘭山).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] during a favourable month; steer 285°-300°; after 10 [f. 18v] watches the ship sees Cuilan xu [Nicobar islands]. Steer exactly 285° for 30 watches; [then] the ship steers 285°-270° for 50 watches, and the ship sees Xilan [f. 19] shan [Ceylon].
properties.textHtml:
• 《龍涎嶼》開船時月，用辛戍針，十更船見《翠藍嶼》。
  • 用辛針，三十更船。
  • 用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• When starting from Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼), sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 24 hours (10 更) to see Great Nicobar Island (翠藍嶼).
  • Sail on a course of 285° (辛, WNW) for 3 days (30 更).
  • Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to see Sri Lanka (錫蘭山).

properties.name: Pulau Rondo, Indonesia to Sri Lanka (direct)
properties.text: 《龍涎嶼》開船過洋，用丹辛針，四十更船。 又用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translation: When starting cross-sea from Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼), sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戌, WNW) for 4 days (40 更). Then, sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to see Sri Lanka (錫蘭山).
properties.millsTranslation: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] and crosses the ocean. Steer exactly 285° [f. 18v] for 40 watches; the ship again steers 285°-270° for 50 watches; [then] the ship sees Xilan shan [Ceylon].
properties.textHtml:
• 《龍涎嶼》開船過洋，用丹辛針，四十更船。
  • 又用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
properties.translationHtml:
• When starting cross-sea from Pulau Rondo (龍涎嶼), sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戌, WNW) for 4 days (40 更).
  • Then, sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to see Sri Lanka (錫蘭山).

properties.name: Dondra Head, Sri Lanka to Malé, Maldives
properties.text: 《千佛堂》，用丹庚針。
properties.translation: From Dondra Head (千佛堂), sail on a course of 255° (庚, WSW).
properties.millsTranslation: From Fuotang [Dondra head] steer exactly 255°.
properties.textHtml: • 《千佛堂》，用丹庚針。
properties.translationHtml: • From Dondra Head (千佛堂), sail on a course of 255° (庚, WSW).

properties.name: Bay of Bengal to Malé, Maldives
properties.text: 用庚酉針四十五更船取《官嶼》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 262.5° (庚酉, WSW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Malé (官嶼).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 255°-270°; after 45 watches make Guanxu [Male island].
properties.textHtml: • 用庚酉針四十五更船取《官嶼》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 262.5° (庚酉, WSW) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Malé (官嶼).

properties.name: Malé, Maldives to Mogadishu, Somalia
properties.text: 《官嶼》澑，用庚酉針，一百五十更船取《木骨都(束)》。
properties.translation: Passing Malé (官嶼), sail on a course of 262.5° (庚酉, WSW) for 15 days (150 更) to reach Mogadishu (木骨都).
properties.millsTranslation: From Guanxu liu [Male island], steer 255°-270°; after 150 watches the ship makes Mugudu [Mugudushu, Mogadishu].
properties.textHtml: • 《官嶼》澑，用庚酉針，一百五十更船取《木骨都(束)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Passing Malé (官嶼), sail on a course of 262.5° (庚酉, WSW) for 15 days (150 更) to reach Mogadishu (木骨都).

properties.name: Bay of Bengal to Lhaviyani Atoll, Maldives
properties.text: 用辛酉(針)，四十五更(船)取《任不知(溜)》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Lhaviyani Atoll (任不知).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285°-270°; after 45 watches make Renbuzhi [Fadiffolu atoll].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛酉(針)，四十五更(船)取《任不知(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Lhaviyani Atoll (任不知).

properties.name: Bay of Bengal to Kelaa, Maldives
properties.text: 用辛戌針，五十更(船)，取《起來(溜)》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to reach Kelaa (起來).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285°-300°; after 50 watches make Qilai [Kelai island].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛戌針，五十更(船)，取《起來(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 5 days (50 更) to reach Kelaa (起來).

properties.name: Beruwala, Sri Lanka to Kalpeni, India
properties.text: 用丹戌針，五十五更(船)，取《加平年(溜)》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 5.5 days (55 更) to reach Kalpeni (加平年).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer exactly 300°; after 55 watches make Jiapingnian [Kalpeni atoll].
properties.textHtml: • 用丹戌針，五十五更(船)，取《加平年(溜)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 5.5 days (55 更) to reach Kalpeni (加平年).

properties.name: Malé, Maldives to Kanyakumari, India
properties.text: 用甲卯針，二十九更船，取《甘巴里(頭)》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 82.5° (甲卯, ENE) for 70 hours (29 更) to reach Kanyakumari (甘巴里).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 75°-90°; after 29 watches the ship makes Ganbali [Cape Comorin].
properties.textHtml: • 用甲卯針，二十九更船，取《甘巴里(頭)》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 82.5° (甲卯, ENE) for 70 hours (29 更) to reach Kanyakumari (甘巴里).

properties.name: Malé, Maldives to Kollam, India
properties.text: 用丹甲針，四十五更船，收《小葛蘭》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 75° (甲, ENE) for 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Kollam (小葛蘭).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer exactly 75°; after 45 watches the ship makes Xiao Gelan [Quilon].
properties.textHtml: • 用丹甲針，四十五更船，收《小葛蘭》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 75° (甲, ENE) for 4.5 days (45 更) to reach Kollam (小葛蘭).

properties.name: Kalpeni, India to Kochi
properties.text: 用乙卯針，二十五更(船)，收《柯枝國》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 60 hours (25 更) to reach Kochi (柯枝國).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 105°-90°; after 25 watches you reach the country of Kezhi [Cochin].
properties.textHtml: • 用乙卯針，二十五更(船)，收《柯枝國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 60 hours (25 更) to reach Kochi (柯枝國).

properties.name: Kalpeni, India to Kozhikode
properties.text: 用甲卯針，二十八更船，收《古里國》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 82.5° (甲卯, ENE) for 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 75°-90°; after 28 watches the ship reaches the country of Guli [Calicut].
properties.textHtml: • 用甲卯針，二十八更船，收《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 82.5° (甲卯, ENE) for 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).

properties.name: African Coast to Xaafuun, Somalia
properties.text: 在華蓋星五指內，去到北長星四指。 坐斗上。 山扮，坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒雨》。
properties.translation: At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N. Ride on a course toward the rising of Dipper (斗). When mountains appear, sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui (葛得兒風, mistakenly written as 葛兒得風) and Xaafuun (哈甫兒雨).
properties.millsTranslation: [From (uncorrected) 3° 12' S, near the equator, to (uncorrected) 10° 26' N, latitude of Ras al Kalb in Arabia] [f. 19v] '[When you are] in [the latitude where the altitude of the] Hua kai star [is] less than 5 fingers [(uncorrected) 3° 12' S] [and] are going to [the latitude where the altitude of the] Pei ch'en star [is] 4 fingers [(uncorrected) 6° 25' N], you set [your course] upon the Tou [star] [Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta of Ursa Major]. When mountains appear, you set a compass[-course] of 15°-30°. [After] 65 watches the ship reaches Ko-erh-te-feng [Guardafui], [which is] Ha-fu-erh-yü ['Hafun'].'
properties.textHtml:
• 在華蓋星五指內，去到北長星四指。
  • 坐斗上。
  • 山扮，坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒雨》。
properties.translationHtml:
• At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N.
  • Ride on a course toward the rising of Dipper (斗).
  • When mountains appear, sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui (葛得兒風, mistakenly written as 葛兒得風) and Xaafuun (哈甫兒雨).

properties.name: Andrott Island, India to Kavaratti Island
properties.text: 用卯針，十六更船，取《加加溜》。
properties.translation: Sail due east (卯) for 38.4 hours (16 更) to reach Kavaratti Passage (加加溜).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 90°; after 16 watches you make Jiajia Liu [Sacrifice rock?].
properties.textHtml: • 用卯針，十六更船，取《加加溜》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail due east (卯) for 38.4 hours (16 更) to reach Kavaratti Passage (加加溜).

properties.name: Andrott Island, India to Calicut
properties.text: 用卯針，十五更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translation: Sail due east (卯) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 90°; after 15 watches you make the country of Guli [Calicut].
properties.textHtml: • 用卯針，十五更船，取《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail due east (卯) for 36 hours (15 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).

properties.name: Mangalore, India to Kozhikode
properties.text: 用丹乙針，二十八更(船)，收《古里國》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).
properties.millsTranslation: [From Goa to Calicut?] Steer exactly 105; after 28 watches make the country of Guli [Calicut].
properties.textHtml: • 用丹乙針，二十八更(船)，收《古里國》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 67.2 hours (28 更) to reach Kozhikode (古里國).

properties.name: Ras Fartak, Yemen to Oman
properties.text: 在三指，觜頭山勢。 去到六指二角直遶《那里》，(用)寅上(針)。 又在六指二角內山。 指坐《布司》上。 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translation: At 9.7° N latitude, there are mountains. When going to 14.3° N, go straight around 'There' (那里) on a course above 60° (寅, ENE). Then, at a bit less than 14.3° N latitude, more mountains. Take a bearing on the rising of Bùsī Star (布司). Sail on a course of 45° (艮, NE) from 20.0° N latitude to 21.6° N.
properties.millsTranslation: [From (uncorrected) 10° 26' N (near Ras Fartak) to (uncorrected) 21° 41' N (near As Salama)] [f. 20v] Going to [the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 6 fingers 2 quarters [(uncorrected) 10 26' N], [you go] straight around that place on [a course of] 60.' . . . 'Again, [when you are] in [the latitude where the altitude is] 6 fingers 2 quarters, there will be mountains to landward [Fartak range].' [f. 21] 'Take a bearing and set your course on the Pu ssu star [Beta of Pegasus?];  steer exactly 45°; [travelling from the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 10 fingers [(uncorrected) 16° 04' N] to [the latitude where it is] 11 fingers [(uncorrected) 17° 40' N], set [this course and] keep the ship on it.'-[f. 21v] 'The angle.
properties.textHtml:
• 在三指，觜頭山勢。
  • 去到六指二角直遶《那里》，(用)寅上(針)。
  • 又在六指二角內山。
  • 指坐《布司》上。
  • 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
properties.translationHtml:
• At 9.7° N latitude, there are mountains.
  • When going to 14.3° N, go straight around 'There' (那里) on a course above 60° (寅, ENE).
  • Then, at a bit less than 14.3° N latitude, more mountains.
  • Take a bearing on the rising of Bùsī Star (布司).
  • Sail on a course of 45° (艮, NE) from 20.0° N latitude to 21.6° N.

properties.name: Mangalore, India to Qalhat, Oman
properties.text: 用丹戌針，八十五更(船) 又用辛戌針，四十更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 8.5 days (85 更). Then, sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 4 days (40 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer exactly 300 for 85 watches; again, steer 285-300 for 40 watches; the ship makes Jialaha [Kalhat, 22 42' N, in Arabia].
properties.textHtml:
• 用丹戌針，八十五更(船)
  • 又用辛戌針，四十更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 8.5 days (85 更).
  • Then, sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 4 days (40 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).

properties.name: Anjediva Island, India to Qalhat, Oman (A)
properties.text: 用辛戌針，一百更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 10 days (100 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285°-300°; after 100 watches the ship makes Jialaha [Kalhat]. Steer exactly 300°; after 120 watches the ship makes Jialaha [Kalhat].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛戌針，一百更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 292.5° (辛戍, WNW) for 10 days (100 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).

properties.name: Anjediva Island, India to Qalhat, Oman (B)
properties.text: 用丹戌針，一百二更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 10.2 days (102 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).
properties.textHtml: • 用丹戌針，一百二更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 300° (戌, WNW) for 10.2 days (102 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).

properties.name: Goa to Qalhat
properties.text: 用辛酉針，八十七更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 8.7 days (87 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).
properties.millsTranslation: Steer 285°-270°; after 87 watches the ship makes Jialaha [Kalhat].
properties.textHtml: • 用辛酉針，八十七更船收《加剌哈》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 277.5° (辛酉, WNW) for 8.7 days (87 更) to reach Qalhat (加剌哈).

properties.name: Mumbai to Musandam Peninsula
properties.text: 九指二角，用丹辛針，一百六十六更船收《都里馬新富》。
properties.translation: From 19.2° N latitude, sail on a course of 285° (辛, WNW) for 16.6 days (166 更) to reach the Musandam Peninsula (都里馬新富).
properties.millsTranslation: [When the altitude of Beichen is] 9 fingers 2 quarters, steer exactly 285°; after 166 watches the ship makes Duli Maxinfu [Tell Masandam, 26° 23' N, in Arabia].
properties.textHtml: • 九指二角，用丹辛針，一百六十六更船收《都里馬新富》。
properties.translationHtml: • From 19.2° N latitude, sail on a course of 285° (辛, WNW) for 16.6 days (166 更) to reach the Musandam Peninsula (都里馬新富).

properties.name: Coast of Gujarat
properties.text: 觜頭也有十指。 在十指，山勢。 去到十二指《吳實記落》。 不到丹戌。
properties.translation: The latitude is 20.0° N. At 20.0° N latitude, mountains appear. Go to 23.2° N latitude for Sir Creek (吳實記落). Do not exceed a course of 300° (戌, WNW).
properties.millsTranslation: The angle is 10 fingers [16° 04' N]; at 10 fingers mountains appear; when you travel to [the latitude where the altitude of Beichen is] 12 fingers, the Wushiji [unidentified star] sets. The direction is not quite 300°.
properties.textHtml:
• 觜頭也有十指。
  • 在十指，山勢。
  • 去到十二指《吳實記落》。
  • 不到丹戌。
properties.translationHtml:
• The latitude is 20.0° N.
  • At 20.0° N latitude, mountains appear.
  • Go to 23.2° N latitude for Sir Creek (吳實記落).
  • Do not exceed a course of 300° (戌, WNW).

properties.name: Qalhat, Oman to Hormuz, Iran
properties.text: 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。 坐乾丹《布司》落。 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
properties.translation: Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward the setting of Dipper (小斗). Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N. Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the setting of Bùsī star (布司). Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz (忽魯莫斯).
properties.millsTranslation: When you are travelling to [the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers [(uncorrected) 19° 17' N], set a course of 315°-330°. The Hsiao tou star [in Hercules?] sets. Again, when you are in [the latitude where] the angle [of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers and are travelling to [the latitude where it is] 12 fingers 2 quarters [(uncorrected) 20° 05' N], set a course of exactly 315°. The Pu ssu star [Formalhaut?] sets. Again, [f. 22] travel to [the latitude where] the angle [of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers.
properties.textHtml:
• 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。
  • 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。
  • 坐乾丹《布司》落。
  • 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
properties.translationHtml:
• Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward the setting of Dipper (小斗).
  • Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N.
  • Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the setting of Bùsī star (布司).
  • Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz (忽魯莫斯).

properties.name: Quoin Island, Oman to Qeshm Island, Iran
properties.text: 去十三指二角坐正北。
properties.translation: Follow the coast to 25.6° N latitude then turn due north.
properties.millsTranslation: Travelling to [the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 13 fingers 2 quarters [(uncorrected) 21° 41' N], set a course due north.
properties.textHtml: • 去十三指二角坐正北。
properties.translationHtml: • Follow the coast to 25.6° N latitude then turn due north.

properties.name: Minicoy Island, India  to Kozhikode
properties.text: 船收《古里國》，(用)寅針五十更。
properties.translation: To sail to Kozhikode (古里國), sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 5 days (50 更).
properties.millsTranslation: [Steer] 60°; after 50 watches the ship makes the country of Guli [Calicut].
properties.textHtml: • 船收《古里國》，(用)寅針五十更。
properties.translationHtml: • To sail to Kozhikode (古里國), sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 5 days (50 更).

properties.name: Minicoy Island, India to Kochi
properties.text: (用)寅針二十五更收《柯枝》。
properties.translation: Sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 2 days (20 更) to arrive in Kochi (柯枝).
properties.millsTranslation: [Steer] 60°; after 25 watches you make Kezhi [Cochin].
properties.textHtml: • (用)寅針二十五更收《柯枝》。
properties.translationHtml: • Sail on a course of 60° (寅, ENE) for 2 days (20 更) to arrive in Kochi (柯枝).
